attributes.action: deceased soldier lee rigby royal regiment of fusiliers
attributes.additional_details:
To call on the government to give the service men and women whom not only give their lives for our country and other country's to be safe and live free from  terrorism  but whom are now being murdered on our own streets to be given a state funeral with full honors like that of the late lady thatcher whom like other government and parliament ministers these people have protected and continue to protect and give their lives for.
The LEAST we could do as a nation is give these brave soldiers the burial they deserve.
